ARABIC: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْكَٰذِبِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You are nothing but a human being like ourselves. We think you are a liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You are nothing but a man like us, and we think you are a liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: you are only a mortal like us. Indeed we believe that you are an utter liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and a mere mortal like us. We think you are a liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “You are just a human like us, and indeed we consider you a liar.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: You are but a human being like us and verily, we think that you are one of the liars!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And you are naught but a mortal like ourselves, and we know you to be certainly of the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: thou art naught but a mortal, like us; indeed, we think that thou art one of the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thou art but a mortal like us, and lo! we deem thee of the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: You are only a human being like ourselves. Indeed we think you are a liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And thou art but a human being like unto us, and we deem thee to be of the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: You are just a human being like us, and we indeed consider you to be a liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thou art no more than a mortal like us, and indeed we think thou art a liar!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: You are but a human being like us and verily, we think that you are one of the liars!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You are but a human like ourselves, we think that you are one of the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And you are nothing but a man like us; and we think that you are a liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: You are but a man like ourselves, and indeed, we think you are among the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:186] You are just a human being like us. And we indeed (in, softened in place of the hardened form, its subject omitted, in other words [it would be] innahu) think that you are one of the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thou art but a mortal) a human being (like us) you eat and drink just as we do, (and lo! we deem thee of the liars) in what you claim.
